template.name: qmail_per_role_template
template.summary: The per role template for qmail

desc.p: This template is invoked automatically for each user, and generally does not need to be invoked directly by policy writers.

param.name: userdomain_prefix
param.summary: The prefix of the user domain (e.g., user is the prefix for user_t).

param.name: user_domain
param.summary: The type of the user domain.

param.name: user_role
param.summary: The role associated with the user domain.

param.name: child_prefix
param.summary: The prefix of the child domain

param.name: parent_domain
param.summary: The name of the parent domain.

interface.name: qmail_smtpd_service_domain
interface.summary: Define the specified domain as a qmail-smtp service. Needed by antivirus/antispam filters.

param.name: entrypoint
param.summary: The type associated with the process program.
